{{Wired embedded system |brand=Viptela |model=vEdge |revision=1000 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=Interface Masters |manuf_model=Niagara 821 |manuf_rev=Rev G |est_release_date=2015 |type=network security platform |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN6130 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL128S10TF101 |fla2=8 GiB |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=MTFC8GLDEA-1M WT |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=Kingston |ram1_model=KVR13LSE9S8/4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SFP (GBIC) |expansion_sfp_num=8 |serial=yes,, RJ-45 console,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip2_model=VSC8211;VSC8211XVW |lan_speed=1GbE |addl_chips=USB to Basic UART IC;FTDI;FT230X;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;TI;MA3232C;;1;,,, CPLD;Altera;EPM2210F324C5N;;1;,,, I2C TPM Device;Renesas;R5H30211;;1;,,, I2C RTC w/SRAM;Microchip;MPC7940N;;1;,,, 2-Port USB 3.0 xHCI Host Controller;TI;TUSB7320;;1;,,, SMBus-Compatible Temperature Sensor;Maxim;MAX6657;;1;,,, 5-Channel Precision Temperature Monitor;Maxim;MAX6699;;1;,,, 512 Kbit serial I2C bus EEPROM;STMicro;M24512-R;;1;,,, Dual Channel Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2062C;;1;,,, 1.8V-3.3V Low-Power Precision CMOS Oscillator;Microchip;DSC1001;;1;,,, Frequency Generator for PCIE USB3 API & SATA;Renesas;ICS9FG104E;;1;,,, Dual N-Channel Logic Level PWM MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6898A;;3;,,, N-Channel MOSFET Synchronous Buck Regulator Controller;National Semi;LM2743;;2;,,, 5A 20V Integrated Hot Swap FET;TI;TPS2421;;2;,,, Integrated 4A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3842;;1;,,, Integrated 14A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3840A;;2;,,, Octal Buffer or Driver w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74LVC244A;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, SDHC Card slot, redundant power, Dual fan, heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.07 |stock_os=Linux;3.10.62;-ltsi; }} {{TagLine|SD-WAN Router}} :[https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/routers/sdwan/vedge/hardware/vEdge-routers-hardware-installation-guide/vEdge-routers-hardware-installation-guide_chapter_0100.html Installation Guide] * [https://interfacemasters.com/pdf/appliances/Niagara821-ProductBrief.pdf OEM Datasheet]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN6130 Quad-core [[MIPS64]] (@1GHz) *Memory: 4GB ECC DDR3 SODIMM *Storage: 16MB SPI Flash, 8GB eMMC Flash, SDHC Card Slot *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port, 8x Gigabit [[Property:SFP ports|SFP Ports]] *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports, 1x USB device port *Power: Dual 12V, 2.5A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Viptela vEdge 1000 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Viptela vEdge 1000 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
